chunks.en: T-floor lottery offers 30 brand new, unactivated UK giffgaff SIM cards for free (SF Express shipping included)

Wishing everyone a Happy Lantern Festival in advance for 2025! This year, we're holding another lottery to give back, and you can participate in the promotion of recharging 10 yuan and getting 5 yuan.
**T-Floor Lottery Rules**
Prizes: 30 brand new, unactivated UK giffgaff SIM cards
How to participate: Comment on the T-floor, any content is allowed, each person can participate once, duplicate replies will be invalid, random floor selection.
Lottery rules: Please refer to the [V2EX Lottery Mini Program]( https://www.v2ex.com/t/1106143)

Draw Time: 2025-02-09 21:25 Automatic draw (depends on the number of floors before 21:25 and the results of the permutation five combination that day, those interested can refer to the [V2EX Lottery Mini Program]( https://www.v2ex.com/t/1106143) to calculate it themselves)
**How to Claim the Prize**
1 Visit [Free Shipping]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/CFdIwKKq8i9GfpkDLarcW1hEnEw) to submit shipping information
2 Visit [Contact Us]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/JnvJwmLA4iw4mOkUBQHcVM0onac) to contact customer service for review
3 After customer service review, it is expected to be sent out the next day
4 Deadline for claiming the prize: 2025-02-11
**What if you don't win?**

If you don't win, you can also [Contact Us]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/JnvJwmLA4iw4mOkUBQHcVM0onac) to purchase pre-set packages or top-ups, with richer [product specifications]( https://ccn4roh2xc2j.feishu.cn/wiki/HNJ4w88l5i1tHBkUGEfcZneZnlg).
If you don't have strict requirements for timeliness (it takes about 1 month), you can also
Refer to [This may be the most comprehensive guide to applying for a giffgaff physical SIM card]( https://www.v2ex.com/t/1095967)
Or
